name: Archero (itch)
description:
Everything you need to know about the game is in the games menu!

Game is not finished and it probably never will. This was my first game that I made with a help of my friend. Game is very buggy so if you get stuck on menu or in the game just ALT+F4. There is a little hole in the top right of the arena where you can escape so pls dont cheat thanks.
